name: The World of Light and Dark
name_original: The World of Light and Dark
description:
The World of Light and Dark is a short, completely text-based game about a world that's split in two opposing sides. You are a Knight of Light or Darkness, an elite warrior on a mission to stop the endless war by eliminating the leader of your enemies. 

Features:

- Text. The graphics are up to your imagination.

- Multiple endings, two for each side!
